description:
Don’t you wish the mainstream media advocated for victims the way they do for criminal aliens and alleged gang members?

This is why Stephen Miller said what needed to be said and called out the media for “obsessively try to shill for this MS-13 terrorist while no coverage occurred in your papers about any of the Americans that were raped and tortured and murdered by the illegals that Biden was importing into our country."

.@StephenM on Kimar Abrego Garcia:

"This is a person that was a clear and present danger to the safety of the American people."

"It is a sad reflection on the state of our media and many of the outlets represented in this room that you obsessively try to shill for this
title: Stephen Miller goes BANANAS on White House reporters over child abuse, covering for illegal immigrant murderers

description:
According to the left, Trump is the worst negotiator of all time, so much so that many have claimed he is advocating on behalf of Russia. However, the United States and Ukraine signed a deal for mineral resources.

Today’s show breaks it down.

"This ties our interest to Ukraine, but it's not a blank check," Crowder said. "This is effectively a way of beginning to draw a line between those with Russia without simply drawing those lies. It solves the issue and it's mutually beneficial."

According to
title: Watch: Trump's Ukraine Mineral Deal and How This Could Effectively End the War

description:
The only reason someone would equate enforcing federal immigration laws with slavery is that they are either painfully naive or objectively stupid. And in Ana Navarro’s case, both may be true.

Navarro proceeded to meltdown on CNN after clashing with Shermichael Singleton by trying to correlate illegal immigration to slavery that has not existed in the United States for over 150 years.

Things got so bad that Abby Phillip was forced to go to a commercial break.

🚨HOLY MOLY: Ana Navarro's complete meltdown on CNN just caused Abby Phillip to cut to commercial.@MrShermichael: "If you com to this country illegally, you are going HOME!"

Ana Navarro: "There's a hell of a lot of people who
title: Ana Navarro has total meltdown, tries telling Black guest that deporting illegals no different than chattel slavery

description:
MugClub Undercover takes on the Department of Homeland Security. President Donald Trump and Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy have signed a deal for Ukraine’s mineral resources. Off a record setting season and a Super Bowl win, Saquon Barkley visited President Donald Trump and the reactions were just what you thought they were. We take a look at how the black community has embraced Trump.

US - UKRAINE SIGN MINERAL DEAL

  • The full text of the US, Ukraine minerals agreement
title: Trump's Ukraine Mineral Deal Explained: How this Could Effectively end the War (Sources)

description:
I believe it was Kierkegaard, or maybe it was Ringo Starr, who said, "Instant karma's gonna get you." Chuck Schumer learned this lesson firsthand in hilarious fashion.

The Democrat "Leader" held a press conference to make the claim Donald Trump has the lowest approval of any other president after their first 100 Days. Let's say, for sake of argument, this is true. In the reality that Chuck Schumer lives in, where a random collection of data and statistics is the lone arbiter of success, Donald Trump's low approval is proof that his presidency isn't going well and that he should just give up and do the exact opposite of everything he is doing.

Again, I'm talking about Chuck Schumer's reality which is the world that his press conference took place in yesterday. The lower your poll numbers the harder you suck, no questions asked. O
title: Chuck Schumer holds presser to mock Trump's bad polling, gets smacked with the fact that his approval is MUCH lower

description:
Sheryl Crow wants you to know she is still not sorry fro selling her Tesla to resist Uncle Trump and Cousin Elon. She is double not sorry she did so in a deceptive video, just to make sure her virtue was signaled that much more brightly.

Crow dropped her debut album, the Tuesday Night Music Club, sometime in the 90s... which, in fairness, was solid. Then, in the 2000s, she did a duet with Kid Rock. I'm sure there were other songs between then and 2025, just nothing that stands out. Now she has a career speaking out on politics, as she did in February when she "sold" her Tesla.

See, once Cousin Elon started cutting government bloat, Crow "sold" her Tesla just so she could donate the money to NPR, part of the bloat Musk was looking to cut.

STUNNING AND BRAVE:
title: Aging popstar Sheryl Crow can't stop, won't stop virtue signalling over "selling" her Tesla (and a detail we missed in February)
